TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiverHook, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class HttpChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelReceiverHook, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 HTTP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸訊息跨越遠端界限 （例如，之間電腦或應用程式定義域）。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains). 類別傳輸使用 HTTP 通訊協定的訊息。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. 通道會使用.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端的遠端物件的呼叫時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. A物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設定遠端處理伺服器與用戶端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 這個範例包含三個部分：The example contains three parts: - 伺服器A server - 用戶端A client - 伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件A remote object used by the server and the client 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/server.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/server.cs#40)] 下列程式碼範例示範此伺服器的用戶端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例示範在伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider clientSinkProvider, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider serverSinkProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (properties As IDictionary, clientSinkProvider As IClientChannelSinkProvider, serverSinkProvider As IServerChannelSinkProvider)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，指定用戶端和伺服器通道要使用的組態屬性值。

span.span: A collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the client and server channels.

param.name: clientSinkProvider
param.span: 用戶端通道要使用的 實作。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the client channel.

param.name: serverSinkProvider
param.span: 伺服器通道要使用的 實作。

span.span: The implementation to be used by the server channel.

summary.span: 使用指定的組態屬性和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 通道接收提供外掛程式的點，以允許存取的基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收也會負責在用戶端和伺服器之間傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收鏈結中，連結在一起，並且所有通道流經這個鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`clientSinkProvider`和`serverSinkProvider`參數`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`.

exception.span: 組態屬性的格式不正確。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

summary.span: 加入 URI，通道攔截程序 (Hook) 應該在其上接聽。

span.span: Adds a URI on which the channel hook should listen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼不應該呼叫`AddHookChannelUri`直接的方法。Code should not call the `AddHookChannelUri` method directly. 資料物件可以用來傳遞至通道的特定初始狀態。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel.

A that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定頻道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序控制的順序中的競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點。較高的優先順序通道連線之前較低優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelScheme As String
public: property System::String ^ ChannelScheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要連結的接聽程式類型 (例如，"http")。

span.span: Gets the type of listener to hook into (for example, "http").

value.span: 要連結到的接聽程式類型。

span.span: The type of listener to hook into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前屬性的值不區分大小寫。The value of the current property is not case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelSinkChain As IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 取得目前通道正在使用的通道接收鏈結。

span.span: Gets the channel sink chain that the current channel is using.

value.span: 目前通道正在使用的通道接收鏈結。

span.span: The channel sink chain that the current channel is using.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收提供外掛程式的點，以允許存取的基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者連結在一起，並且所有通道流經這個鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported.

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMessageSink ^ CreateMessageSink(System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % objectURI);

param.name: url

span.span: The URL to which the new sink will deliver messages.
Can be .

param.name: remoteChannelData

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
Can be .

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 可能是`url`或`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
